text: Rumors have it that the pair is flying off to the'Land Down Under'to celebrate New Year with the'Paranoia'actor's family. Many fans were disheartened when Liam Hemsworth and Miley Cyrus called off their engagement in 2013. The Paranoia star previously claimed that their age and “ different directions ” were among the reasons why they decided to end their romance four years ago. Now that they are back together, avid followers of the couple are thrilled to see them tie the knot despite the fact that they had been keeping the details of their wedding under wraps. Daily Mail previously shared that an anonymous NW Magazine insider stated that Liam Hemsworth and Miley Cyrus had planned to tie the knot in a private wedding ceremony in Los Angeles on July 4 last year.
